resources.string: The QR is invalid, and could not read it
Please allow Health Pass App to access Camera in order to be able to scan QR codes.
Health Pass is not authorized to access the device camera.
This app uses the camera to scan the QR code.
"Tap here to switch between the front-facing camera and the back-facing camera."
"Tap here to either turn on or turn off the camera flash."
Hold camera still with the QR code in the box above
